sentences.sContent: If you study my project, it might edify your mind.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you study my project, it might edify your mind.
sentences.sCn: “我想是你把我看成自我主义者了。” 汤姆说，“如果你研究一下我的工程，你的思想会受到启发。

sentences.sContent: I like to think that these essays edify me in some way, but at the very least they appeal to the voyeur in me.
sentences.sContent_eng: I like to think that these essays edify me in some way, but at the very least they appeal to the voyeur in me.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得他们的文章总在某些方面对我有所启发，起码，我知道了自己心底也是对别人的种种非常之有兴趣的。

remMethod.val: ed(吃) + ify(表动作) → 吃下去 → 陶冶， 启发

trans.tranOther: to improve the morality, intellect, etc, of, esp by instruction
